item.title: EP 189 - Could You Be Tricked Into Destroying The World?
item.itunes:title: Could You Be Tricked Into Destroying The World?
item.description:
Unvaccintated children are now under a scrutiny in a New York county. A new law says they cannot go into public for 30 days or face criminal charges. Could this lead to a dangerous trend in America? And then we tackle the Iceberg Conspiracy topic known as “A. I. In A Box.” Could you be tricked into letting an advanced artificial intelligence out into the world?

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

 

Rockland County Declares Measles State of Emergency, Bans Unvaccinated Minors From Public Spaces

https://www.nbcnewyork.com/news/local/Rockland-County-State-Emergency-Measles-507672921.html?ff

 

Rockland declares state of emergency over measles outbreak, bars unvaccinated from public places

https://abc7ny.com/health/measles-outbreak-rockland-bars-unvaccinated-from-public-places/5218203/

 

The A.I. Box Experiment

http://yudkowsky.net/singularity/aibox/

 

AI box

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AI_box#cite_note-10

 

SCP-079
